RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BET ON BOURBON came out a few paths at the start, set the pace inside of a pressing rival while a bit off of the rail, shifted outwardly while inching clear leaving the quarter pole, lugged outwardly coming to the furlong grounds, continued to wander about while an inner rival challenged, yet held sway through the late stages. RESPOSADO pressed outside of the leader early on, chased around the turn, attempted to vie entering the lane, but failed to keep pace with the leader while altering course inside of that drifting foe inside the quarter pole, kept on to threaten inside of the leader in the final furlong, but was kept at bay. THE MISSING PIECE pursued from midpack two wide and between horses while requiring strong left hand restraint from the rider to keep from lugging out, but bore to the eight path entering the lane once outside of foes, yet ran on for a minor share. BEAUTIFULANDWILD laid off of the pace along the inside, shifted five wide in upper stretch, but lacked a kick between horses. ENOUGH HEART took a brush from an inner rival at the start, stalked along the inside, but lacked a bid before fading. ALLSTAR MAGIC chased from midpack three wide, but yielded in the five path in upper stretch. EYESEEMONEY bumped the inner part of the gate after it rebounded back into her path when it sprung, then lagged behind and was outrun. THE RIDER OF RESPOSADO CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OFBET ON BOURBON FOR INTERFERENCE IN UPPER STRETCH; BUT THE OBJECTION WAS DISALLOWED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Bet On Bourbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: cameout st,set pace ins-2p,shift out/clrd 1/4,drift 1/8,held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Enough Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, stalked inside, no bid, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Resposado
ENTRY.OWNER: Elite Thoroughbred Racing LLC and Menard David
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wd,chased turn,outpaced/altered in upr,bid,kept at bay

ENTRY.NAME: Beautifulandwild
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins, 5wd upper, lacked kick btwn

ENTRY.NAME: The Missing Piece
ENTRY.OWNER: Harden Patricia M and Hargrave Randall
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack 2wd btw, getting out turn, bore out 8p1/4, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 25000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHANIAH broke out at the start, stalked three wide, loomed a danger turning for home, bid in the four path entering the lane, wrestled an advantage before kicking clear at the furlong grounds, and held sway from an inner rival. SWEET BEAUTY broke half a beat slow at the start, tracked along the inside, surpassed an inner rival entering the lane before sustaining a grinding rail charge through the final furlong to reach place a sixteenth from home. DREAM STREAK took a bump from an inner rival early on, pressed two wide, vied while forging an advantage at the three furlong pole, dug in to resist SHANIAH's bid entering the lane, but was headed in upper stretch, and yielded at the furlong grounds. JOAN'S WAY chased from midpack four wide, then lacked a bid in the six path through the lane. MA CHERIE trailed in the five path, came into the lane in the nine path, and hung on her left lead while surpassing an easing rival. MISS G G shied from an inner rival at the start and bumped an outer foe soon after, vied inside of that rival into the turn, but was headed at the three furlong pole, weakened entering the lane, and was eased through the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start,tracked ins,2w1/4,rail grind,up place 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Ma Cherie
ENTRY.OWNER: Cohn Alice G and Streicher Susan

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Mike Harris & Westwind Farms

ENTRY.NAME: Miss G G
ENTRY.OWNER: Guidry MD George Gary Guidry Ruth Delahoussaye Eddie and Delahoussaye Juanita
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied out st,bump early,vied ins foe,headed 3/8,wknd upr,eased

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Special Weight Purse 50000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000 In Their Last 3 Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KYLE BEAUTY set the pace two wide, cruised away in hand around the turn, then widened under intermediate urging before being put to wraps in the final furlong. PURSUIT L'HARMONIE broke sharp, yet required strong urging from the rider to sustain vying pressure inside of the pace setter down the backstretch, failed to go on with that rival entering the turn, maintained a clear margin for place through midstretch, but tired late, and just lasted for that position. ENTITLEMENT raced at the rear from just off the inside, then belatedly split rivals three wide at the furlong grounds, and missed reaching place. VISIONISTA tracked three wide, but lacked a bid. YOCKEY BETTERFLY took a bump from an inner rival at the start before briefly getting keen behind foes soon after, raced at the rear in the three path, gradually shifted out in upper stretch while distracted and staring towards the grandstand, came into the final furlong five wide while hanging on her left lead, and made little impact. BEULAH K chased from midpack along the inside, but faded. DAT GUITAR bumped an outer rival at the start, stalked two wide, but hung on her left lead, lugged inwardly at the three sixteenths pole, and faltered between horses in the closing stages. THE FIVE FURLONG FRACTION WAS ORIGINALLY HAND-TIMED, BUT CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Beulah K
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased midpack insdie, saved ground, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Entitlement
ENTRY.COMMENT: at rear inside, split foes 3wd 1/8, missed place

ENTRY.NAME: Dat Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, stalked 2wd, left lead, lugged in 3/16, faltered btwn

ENTRY.NAME: Yockey Betterfly
ENTRY.OWNER: Whitley Ranch and Racing LLC and Whitley Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumpd start,keen early,at rear 3p,head turned/left lead upr,5w1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Pursuit l'Harmonie
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp start, vied ins/hard urged, no match 3/8, saved place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 97. Claiming Purse 32000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 5, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since November 5 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (Races Wher e Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALEBRIJE stalked along the inside tipped outside of the leading pair and to the five path entering the lane, sustained a bid in upper stretch, and drew clear at the furlong grounds. TANGO CHARLIE broke out, stalked the top pair from the three path, but was floated to the six path while being outkicked by an inner rival, yet ran on thereafter to gain place in the closing stages. SUMMER SPLASH vied along the inside, but was outkicked by an outer bidder in upper stretch, then lost place to an outer rallying rival late while managing show. KENNESAW vied for the lead two wide, but was outkicked in upper stretch, and gave way. LIGHTNING STRUCK trailed along the inside, and moved up without menacing. SIERRA HOTEL lacked speed in the three path, and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Alebrije
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, 3w-5p1/4, bid upper, drew clear 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Splash
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, outkicked upper, lost place late, held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OVER A MILE SINCE JULY 5, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 5 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Enter ed For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERMONONTHEMOUNT dueled for the lead two wide, led around the far turn, then drove clear entering the final furlong. TIO BLAS sparred inside of a rival for the fore, got headed at the three furlong pole, then yielded in midstretch, yet maintained place. MISHKO tracked from midpack in the four path, pursued the top pair from the three path turning for home, but only managed to chase evenly through the lane. COUNTER OFFER settled off of the pace along the inside, split foes two wide turning for home, claimed fourth entering the lane, ran on to vie for show inside of MISHKO in the closing stages, but was denied that position. EAST LEX trailed along the inside, then improved between horses in midstretch. WOMAN WITH A BOOK lacked speed two to four wide, and made little impact. OVERTHOUGHT tucked from the three to two path while gaining inside stalking position around the first turn, but gave way turning for home, and weakened. THE GRAY BLUR tracked in the three path while between a pair of rivals, but faded turning for home.

ENTRY.NAME: Counter Offer
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins, split foes 2w5/16, ran on, vied show late, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Tio Blas
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside winner, headed 3/8, yielded 1/8, held place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 52000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, WAIVER CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since November 5 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOORAY AUSTIN settled off of the pace along the inside, took the turn in the two to three paths before fanning six wide in upper stretch, then offered a steady rally outside of foes to bid in the final sixteenth, and edged an advantage late. BOOTSIE'S GALAXY tracked in the three to four paths, took aim outside of the leader in upper stretch, struck the front at the furlong grounds, drove clear approaching the final sixteenth, but was worn down by an outer rival in the closing stagfes. G'WILDCAT leaned out at the start, tugged forward to duel with an outer rival for the lead, got headed by a wider bidder while sustaining vying position around the turn, then fought on doggedly through the lane, but lacked a re-bid. BINDING AGREEMENT tracked from just off of the inside, tipped three wide entering the lane, but only managed to chase while one-paced. GRAVY HOUND stalked three wide, vied while forging an advantage around the turn, led turning for home, but was outkicked by an outer rival at the furlong grounds, and faltered between horses in the final sixteenth. GOLDEN PALACE lacked speed in the three to four paths, came into the lane in the five path, and failed to factor. MISTER DON was outrun along the inside. SCARLETTSBLACKJACK dueled for the lead two wide and between horses, around the turn, but weakened in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: G'wildcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned out start,tugged,dueled ins,headed ins pair 3/8,fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Hooray Austin
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins, 2-3p turn, 6wd upper, rallied, late bid, up

ENTRY.NAME: Bootsie's Galaxy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3-4p, took aim upr, bid 1/8, drove clear 1/16, worn down

ENTRY.NAME: Gravy Hound
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd, bid 3/8, led, outkicked 1/8, faltered btwn late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 7 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Special Weight Purse 50000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $50,000 In Their Last 3 Starts). (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One M ile and One Eighth.) (Rail at 34 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILLAKENZIE was bumped by rivals on either side at the start, pressed the leader from the outside, vied with her around the far turn, bid turning for home, forged an advantage at the quarter pole, delayed her lead change until inside the three sixteenths pole, then edge clear through the final sixteenth. ICE TIME bumped an inner rival at the start, tracked from the three path before tucking to the rail nearing the far turn, but was blocked behind a rival entering the lane, slipped through inside of that one at the quarter pole, rallied while closing in on the top two in the final furlong, then gained place at the wire. DUAL MONARCHY set the pace inside of a prompting rivals, vied with that foe around the far turn, got headed entering the lane, fought on doggedly through midstretch, but yielded at the sixteenth pole, and was caught at the wire for place. SIR trailed along the inside, improved inside of foes to a tracking position at the nine sixteenths pole, tracked from the two path around the far turn, but gave way in upper stretch. GEM COLLECTION stalked three wide, pulled forward to press entering the backstretch, but failed to sustain that position after a quarter mile, chased into the far turn, and weakened. MEANT TO BE LUCKY bumped an outer rival at the start, stalked from the two path, but yielded between horses at the nine sixteenths pole, and readily tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Dual Monarchy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ins winner, headed 1/4, fought on doggedly, yieldd 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Meant to Be Lucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, stalked ins-2p, yielded btwn 9/16, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sir
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed ins, improved 9/16, tracked 2p2nd, gave way upr

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 51000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, WAIVER CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 5 Allowed 3 lbs . (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNNINGINTHEMONEY took a bump from an inner rival at the start, set the pace along the inside, showed the way from a pair of outer bidders nearing the lane, dueled gamely with an outer SUNDAY BREEZE through the final furlong, and was brushed by that foe nearing the wire while prevailing. SUNDAY BREEZE bumped with an inner rival at the start, settled off of the pace three wide, gained four wide approaching the far turn, produced a bid for the lead outside of the top pair turning for home, dueled while shifting down two wide in midstretch, sparred through the final furlong, but brushed the leader in the closing stages while failing to gain even terms, and hung. DUVEE bobbled while still breaking on top, pressed three to two wide around the first turn, vied between horses entering the lane, but yielded to those foes at the three sixteenths pole, and was best of the rest. JAYS HOLIDAY laid off of the pace along the inside, shifted to the five path in upper stretch, and failed to menace. COUYONS CAUSE stalked along the inside, saved ground, shifted course outwardly in midstretch while chasing, and lacked a bid. SCORING DRIVE stalked two wide, but yielded among foes at the half mile pole, took the far turn in the four to six paths, and made little impact. TAMBOURINE STAR bumped an outer rival at the start, trailed two wide, then in the four to five paths around the far turn, and never got involved. BOULDERING bumped an outer rival at the start, tracked in the three path and between horses, chased three wide into the far turn, but faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Jays Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastien Ronald J and Sebastien Linda P
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins, 5p upr, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Couyons Cause
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Gerald Hernandez Kip Randall Jack and Harrison Keith
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, saved ground, shifted out 1/8, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Scoring Drive
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A

ENTRY.NAME: Sunday Breeze
ENTRY.OWNER: Manganaro Bloodstock Hadelman Peter and LBD Stable LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Duvee
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Keith Hernandez Earl Landry Steve and Duvieilh John
